title: Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool, BBQ & Picnic Area, Package Acceptance
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Additional Storage', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Package Acceptance', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Laundry Facility', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Air Conditioned', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Upgraded Units Available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
